aboutMe.headline: About Me
aboutMe.hello: Hi! My name is Matthias. I'm a passionate frontend developer from NÃ¼rtingen. Nice to see that you found your way here.
aboutMe.bulb: I love engaging with new technologies and learning about them. As a developer, I can now integrate this passion into my daily professional life.
aboutMe.puzzle: Below, is an overview of my skills and some projects where I have applied them. I am pleased that you have found your way to my site.

mySkills.headline: My skills
mySkills.body: I have grown my frontend development skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

portfolio.body: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.polloLoco: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to collect coins and salsa bottles to fight the killer chicken.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.body: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.privacySecond: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.errorMessageShort: Message must be at least 4 characters long.
